title: Lag issues led to re-installation errors.
body:
Roughly three days ago I suddenly began to 'lag' in my games causing many problems. I say 'lag' because not only were my ping and FPS normal, but other computers on the same network worked just fine. The 'lag' lasted between 5 - 20 seconds causing me to either freeze completely for the duration or become very very choppy, causing auto animations and ability animations to be skipped entirely. Yesterday I decided I had had enough and that perhaps uninstalling and reinstalling League would help. I was wrong. I first noticed I might be wrong when the download time for the installer from leagues website took much longer than it usually does and on top of that anything involving a loading screen took much longer than it typically would. Upon finally downloading league and clicking launch I knew it would take a while for the final download so I left my laptop for a while and came back later with it still at 0% and an error screen on the page. I have since then uninstalled and reinstalled league multiple times just to keep getting the error screen. I am currently at "Step 1/2: Updating interface" and it never gets past this point.

Please HELP!

replies.body:
It sounds like you might have an unstable connection, though your ping seems fine.  You can instead be facing packet loss or degradation in your connection, which can result in these input delays or prolonged downloads.  You can run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for these matches to know for sure.

I suggest going through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot why your connection is dropping like that, and get it fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions.
